name: ASRock H470M-HVS Micro-ATX Motherboard: Intel 10th Gen LGA1200, DDR4 2933MHz, HDMI/D-Sub, 4X SATA3, 4X USB 3.2 Gen1, Realtek ALC897
short_description: 🔧 BIOS & Compatibility:   Update BIOS via ASRock website   Micro-ATX form factor - not compatible with all pre-built systems (e.g., Dell/HP/Lenovo proprietary cases)
✅ 10th Gen Intel Ready: Supports Intel 10th Gen Core i9/i7/i5/i3/Pentium/Celeron CPUs (LGA1200).
✅ Essential Storage: 4x SATA3 ports for HDDs/SSDs (no M.2 slots).
✅ Legacy + Modern Displays: HDMI 1.4 (4K 30Hz) + D-Sub (VGA) for multi-monitor office setups.
✅ Reliable Audio: Realtek ALC897 7.1 CH HD Audio with EMI-shielded design.
⚠️ Key Limitations:   DDR4 2933MHz max (no OC) · No 11th Gen CPU support.   Minimal USB: Only 4x USB 3.2 Gen1 (2 front, 2 rear) + 6x USB 2.0 (2 front, 4 rear).
🔌 Basic Expansion: 1x PCIe 3.0 x16 (GPU) + 1x PCIe 3.0 x1 (add-on cards).
